basic.description:
A survey of women writers from before 1900. The historical and geographical focus of the course may vary from year to year; for details, consult the Department.
NOTE    Also offered online. Consult Continuing and Distance Studies. When offered online, it is focused on nineteenth-century women writers in English.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;84P)
basic.subject: ENGL
basic.title: Selected Women Writers Pre-1900

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  A grade of C in ENGL100 (or ENGL110) or registration in a GNDS plan
